body.name: Cetaphil Acne Face Wash, Gentle Clear Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser with 2% Salicylic Acid, Deep Cleans & Treats Acne Prone Skin, Skin Care for Sensitive Skin, 4.2oz (Packaging May Vary)
features: CLEARS & PREVENTS BREAKOUTS IN SENSITIVE SKIN: NEW clinically proven regimen designed to clear and prevent breakouts in acne-prone, sensitive skin
HYDRATES & SOOTHES SKIN: Balanced formulas are specially formulated with hydrating and soothing ingredients to nourish skin.
DEFENDS AGAINST FIVE SIGNS OF SKIN SENSITIVITY: Defends against five signs of skin sensitivity including a weakened skin barrier, irritation, roughness, tightness, and dryness
body.description: This gentle cream-to-lather formula deep cleans to clear and soothe breakouts in acne-prone, sensitive skin without drying. Balanced formula is specially formulated with 2% acne treating Salicylic Acid plus soothing aloe and white tea extract to nourish skin.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #3,122 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #64 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CETAPHIL Gentle Clear Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser treats acne and gently dissolves the impurities clogging your pores to help prevent new blemishes from forming without stripping or over drying the skin, helping to maintain the skin's moisture barrier. After just one week, 96% of users say it leaves their skin feeling refreshed, and 93% say this cleanser leaves their skin feeling purified without stripping their skin. The gentle yet effective formula is designed for acne prone skin, with 2% salicylic acid to help unclog pores to reduce blackheads, whiteheads and blemishes while preventing new acne from forming. Specially formulated to soothe, it contains nourishing white tea and aloe to help relieve irritation. All CETAPHIL products are clinically proven and dermatologist tested to be gentle and non-irritating on sensitive skin. CETAPHIL Gentle Clear Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser is fragrance free to be kind to even the most sensitive skin, with 91% of users saying that they love the lather of this cleanser. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By strengthening and repairing the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skin care products defend against the 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is the #1 Doctor Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand. CETAPHIL cleansers effectively yet gently clean without stripping or leaving skin feeling dry and tight. CETAPHIL skincare products are clinically tested by dermatologists.

Cleanse skin with a gentle yet effective CETAPHIL facial cleanser Start your skin care regime with CETAPHIL Gentle Clear Clarifying Acne Cream Cleanser, a gentle cleanser designed for sensitive, acne prone skin. This soothing cream lathers to gently deep cleanse your skin of pore-clogging impurities while helping to treat and prevent breakouts. Apply it to dampened skin and gently massage. Immediately follow with a facial moisturizer to lock in hydration Follow up with a moisturizer that's suitable for your skin type, such as CETAPHIL Gentle Clear Mattifying Acne Moisturizer to moisturize the skin and strengthen the skin barrier. This acne treatment moisturizer helps to clear breakouts and prevent new breakouts from forming, while also helping to relieve acne-redness and irritation. A daily skincare routine with Cetaphil Gentle Clear will improve the look and feel of your acne prone, sensitive skin over time In a 12-week clinical regimen study, 93% had achieved clearer skin, with reduced inflamed acne lesions in as little as 8 weeks. 91% of our customers say their skin complexion is visibly improved, 88% say their skin appears naturally more radiant without looking shiny, while 84% of users were happy that they've finally found a gentle routine for clearer skin. Complete your sensitive skin care routine with CETAPHIL A daily skin care routine with CETAPHIL cleansers and moisturizers designed for your sensitive, acne prone skin will help to defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity and leave your skin feeling soothed and nourished. All CETAPHIL products are effective yet gentle and dermatologist tested for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product, small bottle
reviews.reviewText: for along time I stayed away from salicylic acid because it was so drying and just seemed to make me break out [neutrogena >:( ] but this product was a game changer. the oatmilk great at keeping my skin relatively hydrated after wash, paired with corsx snail 92 I had great results.bought two bottles, however I run through them so fast that I'm switching to a different brand (unless cetaphil decides to make a bigger bottle). this will always be my fallback product if nothing else works as well.also for some reason the first bottle I got was really hard to lather, it just seemed to clump up, but the second bottle was fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Cetaphil products for about 10 months now. i love this acne wash because I still get hormonal pimples especially when its close to that time of the month. i think I have combination skin and t zone is oily. Before using these products I only used Clearasil lol but i am only 29 now and was naïve to the skin care game. After using Cetaphil my face has improved a lot, I am always conscious on what I put on my skin. My t zone oil problem has actually improve a lot. My face is not dry when using Cetaphil products. Pertaining to this wash. It serves it purposes. if I have acne, I will also do spot treatments so the next day the pimple has decreased in size or is almost completely gone. I use this to wash my face in morning. Nothing is harsh and no smell. I bought it here because Walmart and Target was out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well, is helping blackhead problem
reviews.reviewText: I dont like that this product doesn't lather. It's hard to spread around and takes a bit more cleanser to wash with.I will say that my face feels extremely clean right after using. But it strips a little too much oil, causing my combination skin to overproduce a few hours after washing. Then im trying to soak up excess oil for the rest of the day. Im not sure how "gentle" they can get a product that has salicylic acid in it.Ive been using this in combination with this lines mattifying moisturizer and Hero brands pore release toner/solution. The trio is a little harsh on my skin (causes peeling and redness, as the label warns it might). So I have to alternate and give my skin a break every few days.After using for a few weeks, it is starting to help my blackheads and pores shrink a bit and also the blackheads have become a little easier to remove.This is overall a good product and I will keep using it as it is helping, it just might not be the perfect product for combination/oily/sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Facial Cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I use this as my face cleaner in the shower and it’s gentle enough on my sensitive skin. Yes, it’s a little tight to squeeze out but for me, it prevents me from accidentally squeezing out too much. Good product for the price and does what it says it would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using cetaphil products for my face washing regimen for years. I absolutely love these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just tried this for the first time tonight. After reading all the views again though I feel like maybe I got a bad bottle. Everyone is saying it’s hard to get out, however my bottle it just came on out like runny. Now I’m a little concerned.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin and this is fantastic. It doesn’t upset my chronic hives or dry my skin out. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for my skin
reviews.reviewText: this product is amazing. it is the only face wash i have found that has not irritated my sensitive skin or made me break out. it truly is amazing and makes my skin very soft. great product!
El jabón no hace suficiente espuma, es poco rendidor, me queda la piel aspera
